sentences.en: For some years the Javanese attacks placed Palembang in dire peril.
sentences.cn: 在几年内爪哇人的进攻,看来已使巴邻旁处于极度危险之中.

sentences.en: He was in dire need of hospital treatment.
His family is in dire necessity.
His life is in dire danger from cancer.
sentences.cn: 他因患癌症而生命垂危.

sentences.en: If we had a child, we'd be in really dire straits.
sentences.cn: 假如我们有了小孩，我们会真正陷入困境。

sentences.en: It was obvious, and it was dire.
sentences.cn: 这是显而易见的, 也是悲惨可怕的.

sentences.en: The company is in dire straits.
sentences.cn: 公司处于极度困难的境地.

sentences.en: The country is in dire need of food aid.
sentences.cn: 这个国家急需食品援助。

sentences.en: The people here are reduced to dire poverty because of ( the ) natural disasters.
sentences.cn: 这里的人们由于自然灾害而穷不聊生.

sentences.en: There were dire warnings about the dangers of watching too much TV.
sentences.cn: 曾经有人就看电视太多的危害性提出严重警告.

sentences.en: There would be dire consequences for the rest of the world.
sentences.cn: 对世界其它地区,后果将不堪设想.

sentences.en: They deprived a large number of the overseas Chinese of their means of livelihood and drove them out of their residences in dire poverty.
sentences.cn: 他们剥夺了大批华侨劳动人民的生活资料,然后将他们扫地出门.

sentences.en: warnings of dire consequences that often don’t come true
sentences.cn: 对严重后果的警告，尽管这些后果常常不会出现

sentences.en: We are in dire need of help.
We were indeed in dire straits. But we pulled through.
sentences.cn: 那时我们的困难真是大极了, 但是我们渡过了困难.

sentences.en: We're in dire need of your help.
sentences.cn: 我们太需要你的帮助了.

trans.tran_cn: 可怕的，恐怖的，悲惨的，迫切的，极端的
